name: Vampire Freak
description: You knew vampires do exist, and you have papers to prove it, but was burnt down by a religious group of people who strictly disagrees with your dangerous beliefs. And now everyone has died out, you're free to do things you've been waiting to expose into the (dead) world!...

name: So-called Vampire
description: You clearly call yourself a vampire, and you're too proud just to think about you really are one. But aside boosting your productivity, living alone with your mysterious close combat trainings and a bunch of survivalist's essentials under your shelter has proven a wonderful reason to take a stroll around the ruins.
